alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 10:16AM CDT until May 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:50 AM CDT Friday the stage was 1.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 1.2 Fri 9 am CDT 2.0 2.0 1.9 &&
